thread.title: Hegwood Donna
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Hegwood Donna

author: Hegwood Donna
title: Hegwood Donna
text: Amazing customer service with honest answers and happy to help with any questions then or at later dates. Helped me go through my fathers house full of "stuff" to get me cash for what they could, advised me on things that weren't worth much and educated me on how to know the signs of what was worth money and what wasn't even doing research for me. An awesome experience and paid top dollar. Great Company!
